SEARCH
Package controller

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
controller.NotificationController
public class NotificationController extends Object
Sends various email notifications via Gmail SMTP using Jakarta Mail API. This class is responsible for configuring the mail session and sending predefined types of messages such as password reset, parking code retrieval, and towing notifications.

  • Method Details

    • sendPasswordEmail

      public void sendPasswordEmail(String toEmail, String password) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a password reset email to a subscriber.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - The recipient's email address.
      password - The password to include in the email body.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If the message cannot be sent.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding the sender name fails.

    • sendParkingCodeEmail

      public void sendParkingCodeEmail(String toEmail, String parkingCode) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a parking code retrieval email to a subscriber.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - The recipient's email address.
      parkingCode - The parking code to include in the email body.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If the message cannot be sent.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding the sender name fails.

    • sendTowingNoticeEmail

      public void sendTowingNoticeEmail(String toEmail, String vehicleNumber, int spotNumber) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a towing notification email to a subscriber whose vehicle was towed.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - The recipient's email address.
      vehicleNumber - The license plate number of the towed vehicle.
      spotNumber - The parking spot number the vehicle was towed from.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If the message cannot be sent.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding the sender name fails.

    • sendTowingWithLateChargeEmail

      public void sendTowingWithLateChargeEmail(String toEmail, String vehicleNumber, int spotNumber) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a combined towing and late charge notification email to a subscriber. This email is triggered when a vehicle is towed and it's the subscriber's third late occurrence.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - The recipient's email address.
      vehicleNumber - The license plate number of the towed vehicle.
      spotNumber - The parking spot number the vehicle was towed from.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If the message cannot be sent.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If encoding the sender name fails.
